languages.text: "Тем более на планете бунт. Очень удобно — сколько записей и важных свидетелей могут быть потеряны? Некоторые зовут подобное "прятать концы в воду". И мне не нравится, насколько хорошо эта фраза подходит к происходящему".

"Then, there's this rebellion. Convenient. How many records and crucial witnesses do you think will be lost? Some people call it 'cover-up.' I do not like how aptly this term describes the present situation."
languages.original_text: "Тем более на планете бунт. Очень удобно — сколько записей и важных свидетелей могут быть потеряны? Некоторые зовут подобное "прятать концы в воду". И мне не нравится, насколько хорошо эта фраза подходит к происходящему".

traits.locale_text: "Then there's this rebellion. Convenient. How many records and crucial witnesses do you think will be lost? Criminals call it 'cover-up.' I do not like how aptly this term describes the situation."
"Then there's this rebellion. Convenient. How many records and crucial witnesses do you think will be lost? Criminals call it 'cover-up.' I do not like how aptly this term describes the situation."

"Then, there's this rebellion. Convenient. How many records and crucial witnesses do you think will be lost? Criminals call it 'cover-up.' I do not like how aptly this term describes the present situation."

"Then, there's this rebellion. Convenient. How many records and crucial witnesses do you think will be lost? Criminals call it 'cover-up.' I do not like how aptly this term describes the present situation."

"Then, there's this rebellion. Convenient. How many records and crucial witnesses do you think will be lost? Some people call it 'cover-up.' I do not like how aptly this term describes the present situation."

"Then, there's this rebellion. Convenient. How many records and crucial witnesses do you think will be lost? Some people call it 'cover-up.' I do not like how aptly this term describes the present situation."

languages.text: "Hinzu kommt diese Rebellion. Zum passenden Zeitpunkt. Wie viele Dokumente und wichtige Zeugen wird sie wohl kosten? Manche Leute bezeichnen das als 'Vertuschung'. Es gefällt mir gar nicht, wie gut dieser Begriff die aktuelle Situation beschreibt."
languages.original_text: "Then, there's this rebellion. Convenient. How many records and crucial witnesses do you think will be lost? Some people call it 'cover-up.' I do not like how aptly this term describes the present situation."

traits.locale_text: "Hinzu kommt diese Rebellion. Zum passenden Zeitpunkt. Wie viele Dokumente und wichtige Zeugen wird sie wohl kosten? Manche Leute bezeichnen das als 'Vertuschung'. Es gefällt mir gar nicht, wie gut dieser Begriff die aktuelle Situation beschreibt."

languages.text: « Et il y a cette rébellion qui tombe à point nommé. Combien d'archives et de témoins clés vont disparaître, à votre avis ? Certaines personnes appellent ça "couvrir leurs arrières". Je n'aime guère la façon dont cette expression s'applique si justement à la situation présente. »
languages.original_text: "Then, there's this rebellion. Convenient. How many records and crucial witnesses do you think will be lost? Some people call it 'cover-up.' I do not like how aptly this term describes the present situation."

traits.locale_text: « Et il y a cette rébellion qui tombe à point nommé. Combien d'archives et de témoins clés vont disparaître, à votre avis ? Certaines personnes appellent ça "couvrir leurs arrières". Je n'aime guère la façon dont cette expression s'applique si justement à la situation présente. »

languages.text: «Y luego está la rebelión. Demasiado conveniente. ¿Cuántos documentos y testigos cruciales cree usted que se habrán perdido? Hay quien lo llamaría una "tapadera". Me disgusta lo apropiada que resulta esa palabra en nuestra coyuntura actual».
languages.original_text: "Then, there's this rebellion. Convenient. How many records and crucial witnesses do you think will be lost? Some people call it 'cover-up.' I do not like how aptly this term describes the present situation."

traits.locale_text: «Y luego está la rebelión. Demasiado conveniente. ¿Cuántos documentos y testigos cruciales cree usted que se habrán perdido? Hay quien lo llamaría una "tapadera". Me disgusta lo apropiada que resulta esa palabra en nuestra coyuntura actual».

languages.text: “而且，在那之后就发生了暴乱，时机未免太巧了。你觉得这场暴乱会掩埋多少记录与关键证人？某些人会将其称之为‘处理证据’，这个词用来形容当下的形势，真是再适合不过了。”
languages.original_text: "Then, there's this rebellion. Convenient. How many records and crucial witnesses do you think will be lost? Some people call it 'cover-up.' I do not like how aptly this term describes the present situation."

traits.locale_text: “而且，在那之后就发生了暴乱，时机未免太巧了。你觉得这场暴乱会掩埋多少记录与关键证人？某些人会将其称之为‘处理证据’，这个词用来形容当下的形势，真是再适合不过了。”

languages.text: 「そこに、この反乱です。まったくいいタイミングですよね。どれだけの記録や重要な証人が失われると思いますか？これを『隠ぺい工作』と呼んでいる人もいます。この言葉が今の状況をあまりにも的確に表していて、嫌になりますよ」
languages.original_text: "Then, there's this rebellion. Convenient. How many records and crucial witnesses do you think will be lost? Some people call it 'cover-up.' I do not like how aptly this term describes the present situation."

traits.locale_text: 「そこに、この反乱です。まったくいいタイミングですよね。どれだけの記録や重要な証人が失われると思いますか？犯罪者はこれを『隠ぺい工作』と呼んでいます。この言葉が今の状況をあまりにも的確に表していて、嫌になりますよ」

languages.text: "Bir de isyan var tabii. Epey müsait bir ortam. Sizce kaç kayıt ve tanık ortadan kaybolacak? Kimilerinin deyimiyle tam bir "örtbas" çabası. Bu terimin mevcut durumu bu kadar iyi tanımlıyor olması canımı sıkıyor."
languages.original_text: "Then, there's this rebellion. Convenient. How many records and crucial witnesses do you think will be lost? Some people call it 'cover-up.' I do not like how aptly this term describes the present situation."

traits.locale_text: "Bir de isyan var tabii. Epey müsait bir ortam. Sizce kaç kayıt ve tanık ortadan kaybolacak? Kimilerinin deyimiyle tam bir "örtbas" çabası. Bu terimin mevcut durumu bu kadar iyi tanımlıyor olması canımı sıkıyor."

languages.original_text: "Then, there's this rebellion. Convenient. How many records and crucial witnesses do you think will be lost? Some people call it 'cover-up.' I do not like how aptly this term describes the present situation."
